Class DBSCommandHandle

java.lang.Object
  DBSCommandHandle
public class DBSCommandHandle
extends java.lang.Object

This is a static class that holds constants for each different command. To add a new command, give it a int value here and add a corresponding block of code in the DBSBattle class.

Version:
0.1 Java
Author:
Evan Hildreth, root -1 Entertainment
